About Me

What I Do

My name is VAN LAL BEL (BEL). I am located in Indiana State. I am Specialize in Real Estate and Photos. I help who is struggle to get their dream home, first home, family home throught the process unitil they got they key. In the mean time I also specialize in Photographic as well, I help capture the spcecial momnet to keep and tell the story and share family who live different place.
